pages.title: Computer Port
pages.text: The Computer Port allows you to connect your Reactor to a computer for complex automation tasks.$(br2)A standard set of methods is exposed to the connected computer and you can use them to query the status of the Reactor and control its behavior.
To use the Computer Port you need an external mod that adds programmable computers to the game.$(br2)Currently the only such mod supported (and available) is CC:Tweaked.
